Articles.Content:
I am having some issues after realism overhaul. I think they may cross several mods.

1) I get engines saying they cannot ignite because they lack the resources even though they are attached to an appropriate tank. This has happened a couple of times but mainly seems when i try to make an engine cluster.

2) some of the engines are offset from the nodes on top and bottom. This only affects some of the new engines such as HM-7 and LE-7A.

3) Mechjeb is giving delta v values allover the map. As I add lower stages the mechjeb delta v for upper stages can change a lot.

4) when I splash down I bounce around in the water a lot and it is hard to recover because my vessel is 'accelerating'.

I am sure there are more but I guess I'll post more as I think of them or encounter them.

Thanks for any advice. sorry I am not clearer or posting pics. Trying to play at the same time as posting : )

Mod list:

KSP: 1.0.4 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

Filter Extensions - 2.4.1

Advanced Jet Engine - 2.3

B9 Aerospace Procedural Parts - 0.40

Community Resource Pack - 0.4.4

Deadly Reentry - 7.2.2

Ferram Aerospace Research - 0.15.4.1

Firespitter - 7.1.4

RasterPropMonitor - 0.21.2

Kerbal Attachment System - 0.5.4

Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.0.18

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 3.1.4

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

KW-Rocketry-Community-Fixes - 0.2

ModularFlightIntegrator - 1.1.1

Procedural Parts - 1.1.7

RCS Build Aid - 0.7.2

RealChute - 1.3.2.3

RealismOverhaul - 10.2

RealSolarSystem - 10.2

RemoteTech - 1.6.7

Saturatable RW - 1.10.1

SCANsat - 1.1.4.1

SolverEngines - 1.9

TextureReplacer - 2.4.7

TAC Life Support - 0.11.1.20

Trajectories - 1.4.3

TweakScale - 2.2.1

As soon as you start deviating from the RSS list of 'accepted' mods, you will most likely encounter problems..

Best is to trial and error..

Thanks for he highlights. Trajectories works fine and i realized the engine problems were all KW rocketry engines. Since it seems like in RO it is best to use procedural tanks for everything I got rid of KW anyways since I had very few actually useful parts. I got the soviet engine pack to dd some extra engines with some punch.
